definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The structure variance of soil nutrient is bigger than the random variance.
sentences.chinese: 毛竹林土壤养分的结构性变异大于随机变异。

sentences.english: The milk supplied the goodness for their bodys.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶用来给他们的身体提供养分。

sentences.english: Sulphur powder has no remarkable effect on soil nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 施硫磺粉对土壤养分没有明显的影响。

sentences.english: Fertilizer requirements for plantain in high density arrangements are higher compared with conventional planting.
sentences.chinese: 与传统的种植方式相比，密植大蕉需要较多的养分。

sentences.english: Eat more beans. Beans of all kinds are nutritional powerhouses.
sentences.chinese: 食用更多豆类，各种豆类是养分供应站。

sentences.english: With the increase of tree age, the nutrient resorption efficiency and proficiency increased first and declined then.
sentences.chinese: 养分再吸收效率和转移度均随林龄先增后减。

sentences.english: It increased plough layer soil water and available nutrients content.
sentences.chinese: 大豆覆膜增加了土壤水分与速效养分含量。

sentences.english: Effect of land use and land cover on soil nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 坝上地区土地利用与覆被变化对土壤养分的影响。

sentences.english: The soil nutrient vertical variation feature was significant in Yuanyang terraced field.
sentences.chinese: 云阳梯田土壤养分垂直变异特征明显。

sentences.english: Organic manure should be first applied to wheat to let maize use the residual nutrients .
sentences.chinese: 有机肥应首先施于小麦使玉米利用养分残效。

sentences.english: This food provides all the nutrition your pet cat needs.
sentences.chinese: 这类食品可以给你的宠物猫提供她必要的全部养分。

sentences.english: Can provide a wealth of nutrients as well as the efficacy of anti-cancer vegetables as the best.
sentences.chinese: 既能提供丰富的养分，又有抗癌功效的蔬菜当为最佳。

sentences.english: Aleurone layer was the cell layer by which the endosperm assimilated nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 糊粉层是胚乳吸收养分的细胞层。

sentences.english: However, the long-term application of biogas fertilizer from pig manure was most significant in elevating soil nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 但长期施用后对土壤养分提升最显著的为猪粪沼肥。

sentences.english: Boxed and terraced planters retain more root moister and nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 盒装和梯田种植留住更多的根潮湿和养分。

sentences.english: The paper gives a detailed introduction to the structure and working principle of YN type speediness soil and fertilizer nutrient measuring apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了YN型土壤肥料养分测定仪的结构及工作原理。

definition: assimilation/anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)
